inclusion.criterion: women with clinically node negative invasive or microinvasive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: neoadjuvant breast cancer treatment based on surgeon's discretion (ASCO)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive and ER/PR-negative invasive ductal breast carcinoma, 5 positive lymph nodes, metastatic lesions on CXR.
